name: Adventures Of Spectre
description:
This is a 2d Platformer Game Known As Adventures Of Spectre

Very Interesting Levels and  Without The Key You Will Not Be Able To Open The Door

Controls :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Right Arrow To Move Right

Left Arrow To Move Left

SpaceBar To Jump

Left Mouse Button To Shoot 

DEVELOPER: SUYASH PATEL
